TopicTitle: How to create action group to deploy drills?

Articles.Content:
Is it possible to create an Action group for deploying drills?

 

Selection for Drill O Matic only has Start/Stop/Toggle, but no deploy.

Thanks
It should have raise/lower/toggle, which I usually just use toggle, then it'll have start/stop/toggle, for both surface and asteroid harvesting.

There is a bug in 1.3.0 causing this: http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/15410

It's possible to manually edit the part cfg if you need it right now (see the bug report text), but it looks like it'll be fixed in the next patch.
